mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, userid, password, name, email, phone, address) values (member_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address})

select member_seq.nextval from dual
insert into member (m_id, userid, password, name, email, phone, address) values (#{m_id}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address})
